name: CCRI 1951 Census of Canada: Aggregate data and geography = CCRI 1951 Recensement du Canada: Données agrégées et cadre géographique
description: This study includes two components of the research infrastructure developed by CCRI for the 1951 Census of Canada: selected digitized published tables of aggregate data and a reconstruction of the census geography.

distribution.name: CCRI_Canada_CD_1951_ESRI_Metadata.pdf
distribution.description: ESRI metadata in .pdf format for the 1951 Census division (CD) polygon files.

distribution.name: CCRI_Canada_CSD_1951_ESRI_Metadata.pdf
distribution.description: ESRI metadata in .pdf format for the 1951 Census subdivision (CSD) polygon files.

distribution.name: CCRI_digitized_published_tables.pdf
distribution.description: Summary of all tables from the 1911 to 1951 censuses digitized by the CCRI.

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1951_v1t34.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1951, Vol. 1, Table 34. Title: Population by origin and sex, for counties and census divisions, 1951. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1951. Ninth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 1, Table 34, pp. 34-1 to 34-22. Basic unit of Geography: Census district (CD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1951_v1t41.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1951, Vol. 1, Table 41. Title: Population by specified religious denominations, for census subdivisions, 1951. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1951. Ninth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 1, Table 41, pp. 41-1 to 41-93. Basic unit of Geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1951_v1t6.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1951, Vol. 1, Table 6. Title: Population by census subdivisions, 1871-1951. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1951. Ninth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 1, Table 6, pp. 6-1 to 6-37. Basic unit of Geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1951_v1t7.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1951, Vol. 1, Table 7. Title: Population by sex for census subdivisions, 1951. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1951. Ninth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 1, Table 7, pp. 7-1 to 7-45. Basic unit of Geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1951_v3t4.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1951, Vol. 3, Table 4. Title: Households by number of persons and average number of persons per household, for counties and census divisions, rural farm, rural non-farm, and urban, 1951. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1951. Ninth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 3, Table 4, pp. 4-1 to 4-20. Basic unit of Geography: Census district (CD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1951_v3t6.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1951, Vol. 3, Table 6. Title: Occupied dwellings by tenure, for counties and census divisions, rural farm, rural non-farm, and urban, 1951. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1951. Ninth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 3, Table 6, pp. 6-1 to 6-10. Basic unit of Geography: Census district (CD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1951_v3t9.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1951, Vol. 3, Table 9. Title: Occupied dwellings by tenure showing type of dwelling, for counties and census divisions, 1951. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1951. Ninth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 3, Table 9, pp. 9-1 to 9-8. Basic unit of Geography: Census district (CD).

distribution.name: CCRI_Shapefiles_CD_1951.zip
distribution.description: Boundary polygon files in ESRI "shape file" format that reconstruct the census compilation and dissemination geography for the 1951 at the Census division (CD) level of geography. A NAP metadata record in .xml format is included.

distribution.name: CCRI_Shapefiles_CSD_1951.zip
distribution.description: Boundary polygon files in ESRI "shape file" format that reconstruct the census compilation and dissemination geography for the 1951 at the Census subdivision (CSD) level of geography. A NAP metadata record in .xml format is included.

distribution.name: CCRI_User_Guide_excerpts.pdf
distribution.description: Excerpts from the CCRI User Guide relevant to the geographic and aggregate data components of the CCRI.

distribution.name: IRCS_guide_d'usage_extraits.pdf
distribution.description: Extraits du guide d'usage de l'IRCS reliés aux éléments du c​adre géographique et de l'ensemble de données agrégées de l'IRCS.

distribution.name: IRCS_tableaux_publiés_numérisés.pdf
distribution.description: Sommaire de tous les tableaux des recensements de 1911 à 1951 numérisés par l'IRCS.

distribution.name: Reference_Maps_1951.zip
distribution.description: A collection of maps in .pdf format detailing the 1951 census geography for each province.

distribution.name: v1t34_1951.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1951, Vol. 1, Table 34.

distribution.name: v1t41_1951.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1951, Vol. 1, Table 41.

distribution.name: v1t6_1951.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1951, Vol. 1, Table 6.

distribution.name: v1t7_1951.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1951, Vol. 1, Table 7.

distribution.name: v3t4_1951.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1951, Vol. 3, Table 4.

distribution.name: v3t6_1951.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1951, Vol. 3, Table 6.

distribution.name: v3t9_1951.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1951, Vol. 3, Table 9.
